maneuver.instruction: Walk northwest on Carrer d'Espolsa-sacs.
Turn left onto Carrer Comtal.
Turn right onto Avinguda del Portal de l'Àngel.
Turn left onto Plaça Catalunya.
Turn right to stay on Plaça Catalunya.
Turn left onto Plaça de Catalunya.
Turn left onto Carrer de Pelai.
Turn right to stay on Carrer de Pelai.
Turn right to stay on Carrer de Pelai.
Turn left to stay on Carrer de Pelai.
Stay straight to take the ramp.

maneuver.instruction: Make a sharp right onto Carrer de Sant Pere d'Abanto.
Your destination is on the left.
